content: We could have sold many more casino gaming and point-of-sale printers, and our current backlog across our entire business of over $13 million reflects our customers’ willingness to wait for our product. As Bart mentioned, we believe this quarter’s recurring FST sales were negatively impacted by several transitory issues, and we’re seeing momentum towards a more normalized level in both hardware and recurring revenue so far in the second quarter. So we’ve already booked 7-Eleven terminals in the second quarter, and it’s more – I mean they would normally do 500 a quarter and the bookings that we just got, we got two orders from them is more than the 500, we would normally do in the quarter.
